alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 7:53AM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph leading to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Waterville, Brewster, Omak, Bridgeport, Oroville, Disautel Pass, Mansfield, Nespelem, Okanogan, and Badger Mountain Road. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
